message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this amazing product for $200. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I appreciate your interest. While $120 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $175.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $175, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $140?

Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best price, but $140 is just a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $155. This is a fair price considering the product's value.  Let's close this deal!
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that I won't be able to get a good deal, but I'm still interested in the product. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?
